column4: Hello, having a strange occurrence with my Edgy Eft box.  I have a 60GB root partition (58 might be closer, but you get the idea.)  df and a couple other things tell me the partition is full, but I go to '/' in Nautilus and show hidden files, and highlight everything in there, then click Properties, and it all adds up to about 34GB.  Where's the rest?
there are probably parts that you don't have permission to see
ah yeah, I guess that makes sense.  'Nother question.  How can I search for files above a certain size?
I opened Nautilus as root, and I still only have 34GB worth of stuff
glad I'm not the only one that thinks so
